description: This file contains a utility class 'Formatters' that provides static methods for formatting currency and date values, used to standardize representation of monetary amounts and dates within the expense tracker application.

classes.name: Formatters
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods for formatting currency and date values.

methods.name: currency
methods.description: Formats a double value as a currency string, optionally using a specified currency code.

methods.name: date
methods.description: Formats a DateTime object into a human-readable date string.
